com.jgcomptech.tools.databasetools.jbdc

Class Database.Users

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jgcomptech.tools.databasetools.jbdc.Database.Users
  • Enclosing class:
    Database

    public static class Database.Users
extends Object

    Allows for management of user accounts in a database

                             String username,
                             String password,
                             String type)
                      throws SQLException,
                             GeneralSecurityException

        Creates a new user in the database using SHA-512 password hashing

        Parameters:
        db - database that contains the users table
        username - the username to add
        password - the password for the new user
        type - the user type for the new user
        Returns:
        true if user creation is successful
        Throws:
        SQLException - if error occurs
        GeneralSecurityException - if error occurs

        username - the username to change
